attributes.action: give all disabled people the winter fuel allowance as they need warmth through the winter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the fuel prices going sky high the disabled are finding it hard to keep warm, it is a choice of eating or warmth, it should be both.  The disabled can't help being that way and need as much help as the OAP's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
